author: Sania Farooqui
title: Coronavirus lockdown strands thousands of Indian seafarers
description: With the unprecedented lockdown in place, nearly 40,000 Indian crew members across the world are unable to reach home.
content:
New Delhi, India - Tens of thousands of Indian crew members, stranded on cargo and cruise ships across the world due to the coronavirus pandemic, are still waiting to be brought home.
